title.narrative: Inclusive Policy Environment for Sustainable Agriculture (IPESA)

description.narrative: 1. Conducted comparative budget allocation to agriculture sector studies in Tanzania and Uganda. The report reveals low budget allocation i.e. none of the two countries has allocated 10% as per Malabo renewed commitment as well as high taxation to agriculture. 2. Trained our members on Farmers' Advocacy Consultation Tool (FACT) methodology. An effective tool that connect Apex organisations with their constituency in order to collect farmer views hence elaborate advocacy messages that reflect the needs of the farmers at grassroots’ level. " Policy changes: EAFF HAS held several meetings and consultations with Hon. Mathias Kisamba, the current Chair of EALA Agriculture Committee and Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for East African Community Affairs, Republic of Uganda, who chairs the EAC Council of Ministers to request that the EAC Co-operatives and Societies' Bill be assented by the Heads of States. "

To support strengthening of EAFF institutional capacity through the core suppport intiative to contribute to the implementation of organization strategic plan. A well functioning organization able to deliver on its mandate within Africa region

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
